Solutions for HR leaders
Improve talent management to drive improved performance across your entire organization.
Contact us Watch traveler safety video
Achieve the right balance of performance, accountability, and employee engagement

To attract and retain top talent, HR professionals must create a happy and productive work environment. One good way to do that is to provide mobile-friendly tools that are similar to the ones employees use in their personal lives. With our expense, travel, and invoice management solutions, you can:

Speed up approvals and reimbursements
Streamline and simplify workflows
Fulfill your Duty of Care commitments
Keep your talent happy and motivated

See expense demo See invoice demo

Protect employees, no matter where they are

Data from Concur Travel provides valuable insights that you can use to monitor employee travel plans, while Concur Locate and Active Monitoring help you quickly find, contact, and provide assistance to employees — no matter where they may be in the world.

Get the checklist

Solutions your workforce will actually use

Mobile-first solutions like Concur Expense and Concur Drive allow you to take pictures of receipts, automatically capture mileage, and submit expense reports – all while on the go.

Learn about the cloud Read more about mobile

Streamline your workflows to reduce waste and speed up approvals

Whether pre-approving travel or processing invoices, Concur Travel and Concur Invoice can help you automate processes and prevent improper payments.

Download the eBook

Save time and improve employee satisfaction

Managers can review and approve expense reports and invoices from any device using Concur Expense and Concur Invoice, saving time and reducing reimbursement cycles by two-thirds.

Download our HR brochure

Unify Finance with HR for happier employees and healthier profits

Pairing the SAP Concur solution with the SAP SuccessFactors platform gives both your Finance & HR departments access to a unified source of data. This leads to improved workforce planning and better clarity in performance analysis.

Learn what else the two solutions can do for your business today.

Download brochure Download case study
